name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 405 | Preparing Fuel for Water Pump
description:
This NFT documents a real-world preparation activity at MaMeeFarm™ on
29 December 2025 at 07:47 (Asia/Bangkok).

The activity records the preparation of fuel and equipment required for operating the water pump used in daily farm operations.
This step is necessary to ensure water availability for the farm system.

All elements were captured directly on-site, reflecting real labor and physical resource management under the DGCP framework.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
